page.title: 10Religion.
page.content: Sidmouth caters for{most religious {denominations,}including Jehovah's Witnesses. The{Parish Church}of St. Nicholas and St. Giles was rebuilt in 1859-1860. Fragments of Saxon and Norman sculpture found at the time were portions of an unrecorded church. They indicate that four churches have stood in the parish, namely{Saxon, Norman, {Perpendicular}and the present building. { St. Francis Church}is situated in Woolbrook and is 55 years old. It is reputed to be haunted by the man who has the only grave,-Colonel J.E.L.Balfour. He donated the land for the church to be built. His is the only burial to have taken place here because the water table is so high that other graves might flood!
